content: Lure the melee attackers away from the ranged support and deal with them first before you cross, and the Blazebone will have little in the way of defending itself. Check the interior of the home near it, and you can claim a green Wisp for some Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet'.
The content is as follows:
Lure the melee attackers away from the ranged support and deal with them first before you cross, and the Blazebone will have little in the way of defending itself. Check the interior of the home near it, and you can claim a green Wisp for some Will.
